alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Coffee; Pierce; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 12:37PM EDT until March 31 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Coffee County in southeastern Georgia... West central Pierce County in southeastern Georgia... Atkinson County in southeastern Georgia... Northwestern Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Southwestern Bacon County in southeastern Georgia... Northern Clinch County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1237 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pearson, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alma, Pearson, Nicholls, Dixie Union, Millwood, Axson and Bickley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Coffee; Pierce; Ware
